content.rendered:
Dr Rajini Chandrashekar has wide teaching experience of more than 15 years in Higher Education. She teaches a variety of accounting and business studies modules from Level 3 to Level 7.

She joined Regent College London in 2016 and has since then been teaching different business modules for many cohorts. Her students enjoy her teaching as she makes them understand concepts with her wide teaching experience and works towards giving them good results.

Rajini has also been working in Coventry International Study Group since 2016 and teaches for IFB, IY1 and for PMP programmes and in other University affiliated colleges for HND Business programmes.

Courses taught
HND in Business
